verbose_text: In addition, MtSWEET1a was suppressed under cold and drought stress conditions but induced by salt stress, while MtSWEET13 was up-regulated by these treatments (XREF_FIG and XREF_FIG; Table S2), implying that M. truncatula might have evolved different mechanisms to adapt to various abiotic stresses.
evidence: MtSWEET13 was up-regulated by these treatments ( XREF_FIG  and  XREF_FIG ; Table S2
